content.detailedDescription:
October 28 at 11:05pm

tonight i was walking home on my way from work and i get to right around united and boomer carwash when i look up admiring the clear night sky when i see this random pair of red lights side by side a fair distance in the sky, then they disappeared followed by a single red light center of where the two previous lights just where. then it too vanished only to be followed by the other two yet again. i watched them as far as i could losing them as i got to the apartments which at this point covered the line of sight.

fact1- i know due to.The proportion of the distance of the lights to the surroundings (i.E. the light tower, moon, wind mill lights extra) that this was in the sky not on the ground like a pole or anything.
fact2- also with proportions the span of the lights between eachother doesn't fit the visual for our aircrafts. this thing was large and airborne and beyond the light tower southwest of town.
fact3- the lights i witnessed were bight when i first saw them, as i moved closer they moved away and dimmer.

i will only use the term ufo to this bc i cannot identify what it was
content.summary: Three flashing lights slowly moving se of town. two outer lights flashed then the center

content.detailedDescription: Friday evening, oct 24th at 8:13 pm i was standing outside on a 2nd story balcony looking at the eastern sky.  from my right, coming from the south, i first saw some kind of solid object moving extremely, extremely slow, moving northward.  once this object was in front of my field of view, i saw that whatever it was, was of a massive size.  i was so scared, but i stood my ground and kept looking.  moonlight cast a little bit of light towards it, so i definitely saw it. it was surreal to see it what seemed for the longest time to move across the sky. it was barely moving!!!!!  i stood there in shock.  still am in dis-belief. imperial county is a major corridor for ufo. by the number i have seen and location of their flight pattern, they seem to travel up the gulf of california, entering imperial county via the mouth of this gulf...Which would be via south of mexicali, mexico.Also, i don't think that their choice of flight route is a coincidence.  they are flying directly over the san andreas fault, which runs right up the middle of the gulf of mexico.  the number and types of ufo i am witnessing lately is up.  the type...Very very concerning.  people in imperial county should help report sightings.
content.summary: Massive - moving extremely, extremely slow across sky

content.detailedDescription: There are at least 10 of these objects north to south line east of yuma az... the flash white read green blue ... i am not drinking at all and have been watching them for the past two hours... they are easy to spot because they are brighter than the stars... the seem to be climbing in altitude... i have never before seen these in the sky... at this time they are far to high to be a blimp at this point... they are so bright and still in the sky as i am writing this. they are to far for any kind of picture.
content.summary: 10 flashing objects east of yuma az just hovering in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my car facing east. i saw the object as it started coming up over the roofline of houses. it came in closer still and i hesitated running for camera right away i wanted to see what it was going to do. the object did not just continue toward me it stopped dead in the sky. there was a dark red light on it, it starts pulsing. so i run really fast in the house and down the stairs and in the dark and run back up and out and there's this loud big thing. it thundered overhead and disappeared from view, but the sound of the thing carried in the wind for a little bit.

i was able to get two videos of it.

the first one is the longer of the two. the focus is off, however there are enough frames that lock on that u can see the more, i would say, triangular shape of the object. and also you see street lamp post in fame. it was pretty low....


the second video is a wide shot. it is a very short clip. freeze frame and zoom analysis..


i have filed one previous sighting with you guys. it was in regards to orbs over d.C. i did a video on them

i have other vids of orbs there is one in particular that i think really needs to be looked at it but unfortunately after i uploaded that one to internet i deleted master but perhaps at some later time someone will want to like to that.

there have been a lot of strange things in the skys around here
content.summary: It was quiet, then came forward really loud. heard it for a while as it went

content.detailedDescription: My wife, daughter and i were walking from a movie theater to a bus station and my daughter saw some lights above her in a triangular shape.  my daughter pointed them out to my wife, who then saw them.  my daughter pointed them out to me and i then saw two sets of triangular sets of lights merge into one larger set of lights.  called the local police and news stations for other confirmations but was told no of no other similar sightings.
content.summary: Saw two triangle shaped objects with multiple lights merge into one triangluar shape

content.detailedDescription: Circular size of half dollar at arms length. white light sharp defined edges. thick h shaped light with outside edge up to edge of circle. middle top and bottom of h is black. leads with one of the two black middle part. i was in back yard with night vision scope looking at sky. it was close came from above redwood trees. big quiet could see the edges. could tell the difference between the black of the object and the night.  i thought it was not a prop or jet plane, not a balloon, or blimp, not a helicopter, or missile/rocket, or fireworks, or the lighthouse 12 miles away, or the airport light. i don't know what it was. surprised, frozen in place with mouth open. came from top of trees, to top of trees. i have a sketch but not on my phone.
content.summary: Came from direction of moon left wnw 220 degrees

content.detailedDescription: In my yard at midnight 11/10/2014-11/11/2014 i was observing planes stars moon, clear sky + no clouds + a few days after full moon. perfect night to see the sky + beyond. i'm disabled, getting around + sleeping are a problem some days so in nice weather i sit outside with + without different binoculars. i have some back round in the aircraft repair industry + am still interested + also love looking at the stars + moon. my son is an aircraft tech at jfk airport + everything that flies military + civilian are discussed regularly. i'm no stranger to different crafts + shapes that are seen above us. as i observed the moon with just my eyes i noticed a star "blinked" east of the moon, i checked afterwards + the star if i held a ruler at the end of my arm from the star to the moon was about 1.5 inches, i'll look up star charts to try to identify it later tonight. then looking closer i saw a triangle shape pass between myself + the moon in an wsw direction. from my perspective it was covered 1/4-1/3 of the moon. if i had to guess it was more than 20,000 ft in altitude, i'm sure someone can do the math to approximate the size. it took about 2 seconds to cross + go out of sight. about 10 seconds later it blocked out a star again using the ruler at the end of my arm about 3.5-4 inches to the wsw. the triangle did follow a straight line path. i will try to identify this star also. i tried to look for a few minutes longer but did not observe any other stars "blinking" or movements. i checked charts to see if the iss or any other satellites were in the area + found none. at the same time there were 2 other planes in sight, one heading south about 30-40 degrees to the west of my position + i wondered if it would interfere with the triangle but i observed the plane until it passed the horizon to my sw. another aircraft was to my ne but it was quite a distance from what i observed. i'm sure of what i observed + was not drugged or drunk as i am on a rigid medicine schedule + self medicating may kill me. i believe in ufo's and saw some in oct 2010 but didn't report them as many people did here in nyc there was numerous sightings over a period of days. i've also read many ufo reports so i've entered as much information as i can. thanks for your time, i hope this helps.
content.summary: While observing planes moon stars at midnight saw star blocked out then moon then shortly after another star by black triangle shape

content.detailedDescription:
Could be star but looks like 2 objects red white green lights. look through binoculars.
looking off front porch.
i thought it was a plane, checked again 2 hours later still there.

it just stayed in the same point in the sky like a star, but i am not shore if stares blink colored lights like this one, and it looked like 2 objects.
content.summary: Red green lights blinking in sky. looks like plane or star stayed in fixed position for hours.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking out the trash around 8pm on november 11
 2014 and just happen to look up at the night sky and noticed a strange shape heading toward me out of the north east it was absolutely silent not a sound as it approached it appeared to be transparent for i could see the stars but could make out a v shape. it was huge i'm close to the airport so going by the aircraft i see flying out of here or landing this was much larger. it passed over several times i went in and brought my wife out and she also saw it pass over,i watched it pass over until it was out of sight then it would reappear like it was circling the city or something. i observed it pass overnight four times in like 20 minutes i observed this object pass over my house, it's possible i guess these could of been four separate objects there was a point i lost sight of it before it reappeared, very strange at the very least!. i wanted to stay out longer and watch for it but it was very cold so i went back in, none the less i was stunned at what i just saw!. what was this object?
content.summary: I observed a unknown object flying out of the north east going southwest righ over the top of my house unkown altitude but appeared to be under the cloud cover this obje t seemed transparent or cloaked

content.detailedDescription: Walking with my 2 cats, one of which alerted me come outside. i kept a brisk pace and turned to see if they were keeping up with me. as i looked back i saw in the sky a bright light and thinking it was a helicopter. when it turned red i thought it maybe changing direction and showing a side view. but suddenly it started dropping straight down. within a few seconds it looked like it bounced back up about 1/3 the original height, then dropped again and disappeared behind the landscape. it was too far away, too bright, too high in the sky, and too large to be a toy, especially the way it lost altitude, then regained, then dropped again. there was no sound, no smoke or mist, and no trail of light or smoke. i got in the car and drove toward the sighting, but i was miles away and saw nothing else, no lights in the sky afterwards. as i started driving i realized that light was too large to have been a toy.
content.summary: Bright white, turned red, dropped after holding, went back up 1/3 of original height, then dropped out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: During my 6:pm break at work i move my car from the back of our building to the southeast side parking lot.One of my work mates was looking skyward and told me to look at what he was seeing.There was an object rising in the sky that looked like a small red light.My first thought was that we were looking at an airplane with an engine fire.My friend said that we were seeing the third light in a row and that the light would rise and go out.Which it did.Right after the light went out we noticed that you could still see the object and that it was going to travel right past us.As it passed in front of our building it was about 1 mile away and aprox.5000 ft in altitude.There were no lights or sound.As the object passed around the corner of the building the object was siluetted against the clouds showing the full profile of a saucer shaped flying object.At this point we were discussing the reality of what we were seeing and we are all in agreement that we just saw a flying saucer.I don't know who this object belongs to or where it came from.But i know what i saw and need no further "proof".The light continued flying towards portland and flew out of sight.This was a most profound experience!
content.summary: Saw red light rise then go out.Realized it was flying over us saw sauser shaped object fly north.

content.detailedDescription: Triangle cluster of white lights hovering over the north georgia mountains tonight (hiawassee) appear to be a very large space craft in upper atmosphere. noticed while walking my dogs. we live at about the 3 thousand foot level - no city lights - no street lights. clear night - no clouds. does not look like any other star formation i have ever noticed before.
content.summary: Unknown lights over northeast georgia

content.detailedDescription: On saturday (11-9-2014) around 6pm some friends came over to my house to pick me up coz my truck was in the shop. we stayed out at their house till 8:30, 8:45. we travelled ne along the lingleville hwy (hwy 8), turning onto sully court. dead ahead of us were blue lights in the sky. there was no way we could not have seem them. at first there was just one but we quickly observed a second then a third and finally a fourth. the first one held its position in the sky. numbers two and three joined the first, making something of a triangle. we turned off sully court onto davis ave then turned onto moonlight trl. we quickly drove to my house and stopped in the driveway, exiting the vehicle rapidly. as the fourth light caught up to the first three, it joined them, making the shape of a diamond in the sky. then, they simply vanished.
content.summary: They zipped across the sky. made a diamond shape then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south east from windmill towards foolow in derbyshire. i noticed. a bright light in the sky. tried to pull over to get a better look but a car came up behind me so i had to drive on and pullover about 50 meters down the road.

i looked but could no longer see the bright object. so i took some photos of the sky on my phone on the off change i might spot something. 

got home glanced at the photos didn't see anything of note. then couple of days later looked again and noticed a small dark shape. when i zoomed in i noticed something almost pill shaped about 1-2 miles away, it must have been the size of a small car i think.

i blew the pics up but they are only phone photos. still, when run through photoshop they show the object looks solid.

i have photos and pics of my photo in photoshop to show different version in different light.
content.summary: Bright light inn sky- daylight. took photo saw nothing- then checked pic

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving into a neighborhood delivering papers on royal berkshire ln when i first saw the object.
what caught my attention was the sheer size of the this bright illuminating light, bigger and brighter than the stars that were still lingering about as dawn came.
i had no idea what the object could have been since i've observed conventional aircraft plenty of times in the area.
the object seemed to be just over the tree line in the distance, maybe a half mile away, not very sure, it was so bright i couldn't believe it, i slowed my car down to get a better look and it just moved in a straight line ne, not making any sudden movements or sounds, no other blinking lights or external features just a giant bright white light moving in a straight line above the trees,  i drove on trying to keep track of it but lost it as i approached the tree line, delivered the papers and went back maybe 5 mins to where i had seen it, this time with my back to the area i had seen it, and there were no lights and no other objects like planes or conventional craft in the sky.
during my skin shivered, my mouth was open, kept repeating what the hell is that, i slowed down to get a better look and felt very spooked and kind of said to myself, get back to work and continued on all the while trying to keep track of it but lost it, when i came back i felt weird/uneasy since their was nothing in the sky but maybe 10 mins later as i went on with my route had a strange sensation of dizziness and loss of direction, i pulled over and regained my composure and went on with my route. all this took place within 15 mins with no loss of time.
i lost sight by going close to the tree line it appeared to be over, trees obstructed my view.
content.summary: Giant bright white light gliding slowly across horizon above trees, lost after trees

content.detailedDescription:
Ever since i was a young boy at 4 years old, i have had been paralyzed in my sleep, the feeling of being carried away, and a strong power of star beings observing me from my window. i first recall my first encounter when i was 4 years old when i lived next door to a farm ranch in salem oregon. i awoke to the power of something that came to me in my sleep, but i could not recall what it was that scares me,but the presence of it is was still very thick in the house. i went out of my room to escape to my mothers room, and my intentions were to scream "mom" come help me, but as my lips barely got the first 2 letters of "mom out, my body and thoughts and my whole existence was paralyzed in motion. from that time my mother noticed a small hole in each of my ears, but she discontinued them as my dad had them. i had ear aches that year so bad i had to be hospitalized. as the years went by my mother would move from place to place, and find that when she would throw a diaper on me the diaper would disappear, and all my bedding was thrown around the room.

 we lived still in salem oregon across the street from the main post office, and that is where memory of encounter 2 happened. i awoke from something awful, and it was about 4:15 and my step dad was gone for work, i awoke to my mom screaming, all the curtains shut, and the television was screaming loud fuzz, all at the same time. i looked in my moms room from a distance to catch glimpse of an object hovering above her, which in turn found out to be the clock in her room.

 when i was living on court st. in salem oregon, i seen a 3 ring red or-bed ufo hovering over the house when i for some reason wanted to go outside and take a look. these were my mork and mindy days. through out the years i still want to awake from the stuff that's happening to me while i am paralyzed in my sleep. all my nose doctors say they have never seen a hole in the left side of my nose that big before. i told my doctor my brain was hurting me, so they gave an mri to find the foreign object that's in the left side of my brain, and he said the only way to remove it is brain surgery.I have a hole underneath my tear duct that is 2 inches deep, same with the small holes in both ears, and i have to pencil sized holes under my tongue, that go very very deep.

 my first time i seen an et was when i was 19 years old. the event of the appearance came from seeing the star playing peekaboo in and out of a tree right outside, looking out the house windows, from within side the house. my friends mother saw it and seen that it pace back and forth from this tree outside, so she and i went on a ufo hunt in her truck, this ufo turned bright red right before our very eyes and very slowly moved over the hill. very pridefully moved as if its not scared. that following night i was in a trance in my sleep again and decided in my sleep, 'i am going to over power this, i am going to force my eyes to open and open my eyes went, to see i was out of my bed and in the living room on my back and on the ground. i caught the eyes of this moon colored creature hovering above me, as i began to gaze in its eyes it floated out the sliding glass doors from the room. i have much more encounters, but will try to keep this shorter.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A hovering, moving, but lose range star just below a treetop. will move in and out of the tree, apearing to play peakaboo with tree, while i am looking out the window at it. my 13 year old son is seeing this same object, but red and mooved faster.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were traveling nb on i-75 to the 280 on ramp when i looked up and asked him what the 2 blinking lights were in the distance...And why they looked to be stationary...He said oh honey it's a helicopter flying straight so it appears to be still in the sky...As i drove it got closer...I was able then to see 3 lights-1 was white, 1 was green, 1 was orange-ish...And to my utter amazement i could literally see the triangle that connected the 3 lights! the traingle was like all grey, metal, chrome, lead colored- darker and more dull in places and shinier more reflective in others- it hovered over the interstate! made absolutely no noise! i seen it right out my front windshield! because i was druving about 55/60mph i went under it and lost sight-so i yelled to my husband to look up and out his passenger window-and asked what it that?!?!? he said slowly, ummmm, i don't know what it is, but it's not anything he'd ever seen, he said it was a triangle too-connected by the 3 lights at each point-not a helicopter, not a plane, not a kite, it was huge and very low-it looked higher when i first observed it but when it went over us-it was like directly above us-maybe a football field up in distance-because we were traveling i had to turn onto 280 and we lost sight if it! the feeling was surreal, as though it was a dream because who sees a ufo at 6:45pm in toledo? well the answer is us! it was a ufo! a triangle ufo, metal, with lights and no noise...I'm still in awe of what i seen that night...We had camera phones, but i couldn't grab mine driving and my husbands phone battery was almost dead-wouldn't take a pic-i ish i could've, i doubt i'll ever see that again!! when i tell people they look at me all crazy but i know, we know what we seen-thanks! oh, and i could draw or explain it so well that a good artist could draw it up quite easily!!
content.summary: Traveling nb on i-75 when i seen 2 blinking lights up in the sky-it moved se towards us and when directly above us-we could see the triangle with a light at each point-no noise

content.detailedDescription: My neighbor and myself were outside watching sunday night football when my neighbor said " hey, that's not a plane". i looked up and told him it looks like a satellite or maybe a meteor.  i told him i see the time.As we were stcouldn't see it anymore. he said he still could, at this point, both of us saw what appeared to be a triangle abner that had a glowing light that looked like the light was being reflected from the ground.,the object  that appeared to be flying low, but it was dark and i couldn't tell the distance. it appeared to just disappear as quickly as it appeared, i only saw it for 4_5 seconds. we went inside and told my family, they think i'm crazy. myself and my neighbor know what we saw.
content.summary: We saw a satelite across the sky. satelite disappeared, a triangle shape appeared above us, not a plane! unkown size speed or distance.

content.detailedDescription:
Jag var på semester i turkiet,alanya den 04 11 2014.Tog flera kort på staden från utsikt platsen, kastel på en kulle hög 150-200meter.
såg ingenting då, men efter några dagar när jag tittade mer detaljerat såg ett konstigt föremål.Tacksam för några svar om möjligt!
mvh
emir
content.summary: Tog några bilder med min sony xperia 20,5 megapixel och såg bilden efteråt.

content.detailedDescription: Large triangle object that appeared to climb above the mountain and with slow counter clockwise rotation with a humming sound going from north to south.
content.summary: Weird!

content.detailedDescription: We were driving from tucson az to phoenix az to watch a basketball game. we had just entered city limits when we noticed the strange lights. we pulled over on the freeway to take a better look. we noticed that the lights were forming different shapes and were hovering without movement. we also notice light appear and disappear. we took a small video of what we saw. we had to continue driving, but while on the road about eight lights appeared in a straight line. we did notice many helicopters close to the lights, as if they were trying to get rid of them. we continued driving north and the lights disappeared. this incident lasted about 25 minutes.
content.summary: Lights over phoenix az

content.detailedDescription:
Our family was celebrating mother`s day and i for some reason chose a portion of the sky (south easterly) to take two rapid fire photographs. i saw nothing but beautiful clouds with a royal blue patch of semi-clear sky.

my children and their children were also at my home. but, they did not see anything also.

two rapid shots were taken of the same portion of the sky. nothing was noticed until the photographs were reviewed. the first shot revealed numerous dots and the second shot indicated that the dots had disappeared. when the photographs were enlarged and darkened slightly, i noticed that some of the objects were saucer shaped with domes on top.
content.summary: Two rapid shots were taken of the same portion of the sky. nothing was noticed until the photographs were reviewed.

content.detailedDescription: i observed a large triangular shaped object while i was walking my dogs at about between 10:30 and 11:00 pm movement was from south to north and also observed small orbs on sat nov 8,2014 at about 10:30 pm also we have a friend that observed on thursday nov 6,2014 late that night of the same trianglure object and took a photo on his cell phone the object made a type of humming sound also the object size was at least three football fields in size and had a bluish glow the rear of the oject had a type of honey comb exhaust system. the phone is a trackphone so we do not know how to upload the one that has this photo is robby wilson.
content.summary: Description is noted as below

content.detailedDescription: Driving through my parent's neighborhood, spotted a bright round orange sphere hovering (no movement at all). thought it might be a new radio tower top or something but it was brighter than a warning light and orange. i noticed it because there was nothing else in the sky (stars or planes in this area and it was pitch black with a ball of orange) it was over an area that does not have any tall structures. i asked my daughter to keep an eye on it as i was driving. she said it wasn't moving, i continued to drive down a hill, turned into the neighborhood that my parent's live and continued to watch it. i then pulled into driveway, got out of car, saw the object now moving toward the south east. once it flew toward that direction, a plane in the further distance could be seen, flashing lights and all so i knew this wasn't a plane. wish i could have snapped a shot with the plane behind it to compare. it then increased speed and was out of sight pretty quick. seemed to be somewhat low because i could no longer see it once it took off in the distance.
content.summary: Round orange shere hovering, no flash, no sound. after about a min, it started to slowly move off toward se. saw a plane in the distance so it def. wasn't a plane. wish i had gotten a photo with plane behind it for comparison.

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my father, who lives around the corner and was going to the grocery store to pick up items for dinner. i grew up around the corner from the area so i am very familiar to what is normally in the sky in that area. i spotted the lights immediately as i turned from pottruff rd to ede street ( east bound ). i then stopped the car on the sw corner of ede and nugent dr to take the picture and watch the lights. i originally thought that it was helicopters. i noticed that there was no flash of white light, that i normally see from airplanes and that the red was a different colour from what is normal. i observed them hovering for about 2 minutes and decided to move to different vantage point. i headed south on nugent to kentley drive and turned east on kentley. objects were then on my right, or south, they had to have moved, otherwise the orientation in the sky would not work. i observed for about another minute and lost sight of them after that.
content.summary: Red orbs hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was going down town to pickup the mail with my daughter.  after we came out of the post office and got in the truck she noticed something in the sky to the west and asked me to go across the bridge for a better look.  i did and you still couldn't see what she had seen very well so i turned around and headed back towards the post office and up the hill to the hospital parking lot. we were looking at these strange clouds/jet trails.  i'm still not sure what they were because a jet leaving a long trail crossed paths with one. they were in the sky for awhile .   my daughter was positive they were meteors or ufos.   well i turned my head away a saw a silvery, sort of cigar shaped object in the sky to the north. it was moving to the southeast.   the object seemed to be thinner in the middle.  i called to my daughter to look and grabbed my phone and took a picture before it disappeared.  i took the photo and lowered my phone and couldn't find it anywhere in the sky.  my daughter stayed outside while i ran inside the hospital to pick up a prescription.  i told the two people inside what i had seen and the guy said he had videotaped lights in the sky on the other side of town but hadn't shown anyone.  he ran outside to have a look at the clouds/jets/ufos my daughter was looking at.  she also videoed and took photos of what she was looking at. technically i guess there was two sightings.
content.summary: Was in the hospital parking lot looking west at some weird looking clouds or jets with my daughter turned my head and saw a ufo

content.detailedDescription: Officer reported seeing a black, triangular object with two white lights on the rear underside and a red light on the front underside of object. officer is cessna pilot but could not identify object as known aircraft of any type. reported it made a loud humming noise unlike any aircraft noise know to him. the lights flashed in off/on pattern as it flew overhead at about 3000 feet travelling from the northwest to the southeast at approximately 300 mph. object flew beyond observable horizon.
content.summary: Black triangle with two white lights on rear and a red light nearer the front

content.detailedDescription: Three family members finished dinner at allen park restaurant around 7:30 or a bit later. no alcohol consumed. pulled out of driveway onto allen rd, going east, and saw a path of bright, cherry red, glowing lights in the east, about 45 degrees. there were 7 or 8 small spheres lined up in a curved arch. then four repositioned into an oval shape, all changed patterns a few more times, then one by one, ascended, growing smaller, turning white, then vanishing. when the last one vanished, the sky was dark, very clear, with no trace of any elements coming from where the lights were spotted. the lights created no audible sound. it was a clear night and these lights were very distinctive. a plane approached the direction of the lights from the sw, but was a good distance away -- had to turn around to see it. the direction of the lights were not near an airport, although it was not possible to discern just how far above they were. this experience was unique and not confused with any light event on the ground or coming from the ground. we were excited, but had no adverse or unusual feelings or reactions.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 3 normal adults notice red glowing lights in sky, unlike anything ever seen looked across sky saw a plane in sw, well away from lights, heading e. each light changed positions from path, ascended one at a time, growing smaller, white, then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the street with family when i looked out the window and  saw a triangular object with lights flying over houses. i noticed it because it was right in my line of vision and perfectly visible. i had no idea what it was when i first saw it. it was black and triangular and had blue lights around the outside, and turned on its side while flying, and changed direction after a few minutes. i was very confused when seeing it, because as we got closer to it i thought there would be an explanation for what it was (that i'd discover it was just a sign or a reflection or something) but then i saw that it was just an object flying on its own accord, like a drone or something, except i googled pictures of drones and it doesn't match any that are used by the us government or google. i lost sight of the object as we drove beyond it, and i think it started flying away. when we drove back five minutes later it wasn't there anymore.
content.summary: Saw strange thing flying over houses on street while driving. others in the car witnessed it too.

content.detailedDescription: Not much to tell my wife and i saw a small? red colored light in the sky over the shore wood subdivision some distance way. my wife stated a plane was in the area further north east. i was driving and stopped at the stop sign exiting  aribou dr. the red light had a blueish auora or that's what it looked like anyway. the light moved up and down and stopped then started but progressed eastward till i could no longer see it. i tried to get video with cell phone but cannot see anything in the video.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red light with blueish aoura seen moving north some distance away over shore wood addition.
